message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $150 to you, but I'm willing to let it go for $140 today. Don't miss out on this exclusive opportunity!
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit too high for me.  I'd be willing to pay $110.
I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. Considering your offer, I am willing to negotiate further. How about $125?
I understand you're firm on the value, Alice.  How about we meet in the middle at $117?
Bob, I've considered your latest offer carefully. To reach an agreement, how about we settle on $122 for the product?
